item.description:
The best way to greet 2013!  Always a fun time at Daniels Hall with a packed house of friendly people.  The party goes to 12:30, we do put out a light buffet and of course you can bring your own food, liquor and noise makers.  The party is casual but most people on New Years Eve do dress to impress.

 

Admission is $15.00 "a bargain" and there will be two professional DJ's using an amazing sound system to play your requests and most popular dance hits.  All in all you will have fond memories of this night and meet loads of friendly fun loving people.

 

Play the video below to experience a New Years Eve party at Daniels Hall.

Dave McDermott "Happy New Year"
item.name: New Years Eve Party
